storyInfo: A song echoes across the city as the sun begins to set, and Severin launches a search thinking that this was a signal for colluding enemies. Suzuran and Folinic have a dispute over whether to stop fighting and expand rescue efforts, or to continue searching for the perpetrator of the murder.

attributes.content: Singing...?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: How...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Wow, it's echoing through the whole town...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: A pale blue light spills over the desolate streets. In amongst the flickers of illumination, are people and the lives they led.
The two stand alone in an otherwise empty town. The hazy song weaves into a web, and the sun continues to set.
Exposed Originium clusters, restless protesters, pale starlight, and mud bricks all fall silent together.
All that remains... is the song...
What is this... what am I seeing? Are these Originium Arts?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: A folk song...? Or a poem? At sunset?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Is this a Wolumonde tradition?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Um... Miss Folinic, do you understand the lyrics?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: No... is that the Leithanian tongue? It doesn't sound like modern Leithanian pronunciation...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: But... it sounds nice.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: It reminds me of looking out over the plains from the bridge of Rhodes Island for the very first time. It's melodious... ancient...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: This is... also Arts... but the same kind as the ancient Arts of Higashi!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Find them.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Sure, but then what? Arrest them?
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: That'll just stir up even more resentment.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: We're doing this to keep them from fomenting animosity between Infected and non-infected. The Winterwisps may well have been behind all this.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Mr. Severin?! Wh-what is this?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: It's a Winterwisp ballad, for rituals and funerals.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: The Winterwisps are responsible for agitating Infected conflicts and leading the partisans to destroy our power plant.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Now is not the time for leniency. They're trying to tell us something.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: They wouldn't tip their hand for no reason. There must be others out there in the shadows. Probably casters. Keep an eye out.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: What exactly is a Winterwisp?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Local Caprinae. They were the people of these mountains, centuries ago.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: What happened to them?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Wolumonde clashed with the Winterwisp. Nothing more.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: No. There's more to it than that.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Columbia and Rim Billiton, pretty much every country has some kind of history of settler colonialism. There's another force at work here.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: You're just looking for a simple answer to dodge the question, aren't you? You'll just leave it as 'conflicts' and 'clashes?'
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I'm not sure I should be talking about this with you. It goes beyond what Rhodes Island has a need to know...
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: A Gendarmerie telling these things to a foreign enterprise will make certain aristocrats very unhappy.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: You're... worried about unhappy aristocrats...?!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Atro sacrificed herself for you! And you're talking about saving face?!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: M-Miss Folinic! Her sacrifice... shouldn't be ammunition for an argument.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Mr. Severin...! Can you please stop this manhunt? It's only agitating people. It's only going to make things worse!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: No... We're following our only lead. We can't afford to lose it.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Huh...?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Severin, with as many nomadic cities as there are in Leithanien, do you really think any of those nobles give a shit about you from atop their ivory towers?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Even considering the Great Rift, if a nearby city were to offer support, would there really be a famine?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Severin, look at the situation. See for yourself who is really here to help you!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I know... Miss Folinic. I know better than anyone.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But I also know Rhodes Island can't help us forever. Once we're safe again and Wolumonde is back on course, I don't want to be getting letters from those ivory towers.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: You have to understand that.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But Miss Folinic, we—
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: —An explosion?! Another attack?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Schultz! Help! We need help!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Slow down. What happened?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: They, they activated those town defense things! They exploded, and everything's burning, they—!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Calm down!
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Schultz! The Infected... they've captured all of the Gendarmerie patrolling Zwölftontechnik Strasse! We lost contact with them!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: They're using the Gramophones to push us back. The whole district is out of control!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: They shouldn't be so well-organized. Who's leading them?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: We don't know. But a lot of the non-infected have joined the protest. Wolumonde is completely divided!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Ugh. Damn you, Winterwisps...
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Surround the district. Control the crowd. We have to take the town back.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: *Cough* *cough*, *hack* *cough*!
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Schultz!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Damn it... You get back to the Rathaus and sound the alarm. This has devolved into something far worse than just a dispute between the Infected.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I'm putting Wolumonde under martial law. Raise the entire militia.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But if we start killing each other now, Wolumonde won't survive the winter!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: I gave you an order!
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Y-yes sir!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: As for you Rhodes Islanders... Do what you feel is right.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: To be frank, I don't have time to keep an eye on you.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I still need more information.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: B-but we should do what we can to help people first... A lot of innocent civilians are getting caught up in this mess...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: We'll find the killer. That takes priority.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: ...I promise, Wolumonde will provide Rhodes Island with a satisfactory answer.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I hope you'll keep that promise.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: If I'm still alive by then.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: ...Miss Folinic, we should have stopped Mr. Severin.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: No use. You saw them. The pressure's gotten to them.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Oh... is that so?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But if a famine really is as imminent as the officer says, we'll still have to...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: ...The only way to calm everyone down is to find the murderer as soon as possible. And letting our one lead go cold isn't an option.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: That's not what I meant...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Miss Folinic, do you really think finding the killer will solve all our problems?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Try to stay calm, Miss Folinic.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: ...Suzuran?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: You know... everyone is burning with rage right now. Nobody has a clear head.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I think... it's just my gut feeling, but my intuition is usually pretty accurate!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I think maybe... something even worse is starting to happen. The kind of thing that you can't be sure if it's right or wrong...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: What we have to do is try to help as many innocent people as we can.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Miss Folinic... If we don't stop Mr. Severin, things are going to get really, really bad.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: ...Maybe you're right.
attributes.name: Folinic
